## MapControls.pointToNorth() method

Reset the camera to looking north, in an orbiting movement around the target point instead of changing the yaw (which would be the camera rotating on itself).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pointToNorth(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
